== Qtile Dependencies ==  
    * psutils
    * python-pustils 
    * python-dbus
    * python-dbus-next
    * python-extras
    * python-gobject 
    * UPower -- Only works with SystemD 
=== Nerd Fonts === 
    * wget  https://github.com/ryanoasis/nerd-fonts/releases/download/v3.3.0/JetBrainsMono.zip
    * wget https://github.com/ryanoasis/nerd-fonts/releases/download/v3.3.0/NerdFontsSymbolsOnly.zip
    * _unzip {zip directory} -d {target directory}_ 
    * font directory: _/usr/share/fonts_ 
    * update fonts: _fc-cache --verbose_
